short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost focus with gentle task reminders. Ideal for the easily distracted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusDay is your friendly Chrome buddy, perfect for anyone who finds themselves easily sidetracked, especially if you have ADHD. Just set your top tasks for the day, and FocusDay will pop up gentle reminders to keep you on point as you browse. It's like having a little helper right in your browser, making sure you stay focused and smiling through your to-do list. Give it a whirl and see how much more you can get done!

No signup required. All information saved locally in your browser.
